NewsArticle.Title: Updates
NewsArticle.Content: Skills/Spells - Star Arrow: requires an equipped bow - Raging Attack: cooldown similar to Cyclone Kick, increased damage - Dune Swipe 7-8: fixed bug damage, also increased damage - Strikedown: Increased damage - Talon Kick: Decreased damage Castle Battle - Removed 3 Castles. Only 2 Castles can now be accessed (Caisteal Bailceach & Caisteal Eagna) - More Castle Battle updates in the future For comments and suggestions, please send a support ticket to Dark Ages or contact Error/Listen. DA Team
